title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.39 - Town of Ripley
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.39 - Town of Ripley

State Regulations
(a) The
northbound and southbound roadways of Shortman Road between I-90 (exit 61) and

Route 20, in the Town of Ripley. (b) The eastbound and westbound roadways of

Route 20 between Shortman Road and a point 3/10 of a mile east of Shortman

Road, in the Town of Ripley. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8106.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
